items.text: thick edge, but races to the third man boundary where the ball beats Tahir. Edge found, but no luck for South Africa. This climbed on him but Mushfiqur played it with soft hands by taking the bottom hand off the grip.
items.shortText: Rabada to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: just lets this quick delivery to zip through
items.postText: Fabulous passage for Bangladesh as this stand threatens to derail South Africa's designs. Alex Malcolm is back with the controls to take you through till the end of this innings.
items.shortText: Rabada to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Thanks Shashank. Huge problems for South Africa. This pair have added 132 so far. Their highest partnership in ODIs is 148 in 2014 against Zimbabwe.
items.text: tossed up, he drives off a thick edge and it runs to short third man
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: very full, he digs it out back to the bowler
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: looped up on off, he sweeps along the ground to deep backward square
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: leg break wide of off, he drives powerfully but straight to deep cover
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full toss, he lofts this down the ground but it's not well timed, placed nicely straight of long off for a couple
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.preText: Highest third wicket partnership for Bangladesh against South Africa
items.text: edged and it goes fine of short third man! It was a full wrong un, he leaned back to drive, got a thick edge and it ran fine beating the man on the circle
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: shorter length, top of off, he's back and defending to backward point
items.shortText: Rabada to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: shorter into the ribs, he defends with soft hands close into the leg side but the man races in to prevent one
items.shortText: Rabada to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length, on off, he defends with soft hands into the off side and they call quickly and run brilliantly to get ine
items.shortText: Rabada to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full and wide of off, he climbs into a drive but can't beat cover
items.shortText: Rabada to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Sean Daniel: "The best thing about this inns is the way they have played both Rabada and Tahir.. not just trying to see them through but been attacking them.. goes to show how far they have come and clearly making a statement today with the bat.. "
items.text: bouncer he tries to pull and misses, huge appeal for caught behind, not out is the call. South Africa review. He's missed this by some margin. Nothing on snicko. Not out remains. South Africa lose the review
items.shortText: Rabada to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: wide full toss, he hammers a square drive to deep point, Miller misfields but they only get one
items.postText: Good over for South Africa. Only two from it but they lost their review
items.shortText: Rabada to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: Bowled him! Tahir makes the breakthrough! He exposed his stumps stepping outside off early to sweep behind square to the vacant boundary, it was very full, he missed the sweep because of the length, and it crashed into middle and leg!
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan  b Imran Tahir 75 (117m 84b 8x4 1x6) SR: 89.28

items.preText: Mohammad Mithun in at No.5. Slip in
items.text: flatter on off, he's back and defending
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: leg break, tossed up outside off, he steps forward and defends
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full toss and he slog sweeps with ease over deep midwicket! Just short of a six! That was a gift
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: tossed up outside off, he pushes off the front foot through cover-point
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: flatter and fuller, he drives back to the bowler
items.postText: That partnership between Shakib and Mushfiqur was Bangladesh's highest partnership in World Cups
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: cuts him in half nipping back from outside off past the inside edge and over off stump
items.shortText: Rabada to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: 141kph, back of a length outside off, he defends off the inside edge onto pad and it drops down
items.shortText: Rabada to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: Wajid Jawaid: "Another one missing his century. Will Mushfiq make it or will we have to wait longer for the first century of this World Cup?"
items.text: 146kph, but sprayed well down the leg side and called wide
items.shortText: Rabada to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: 141kph, rearing short ball up into the ribs, he's up on his toes and defending awkwardly but effectively
items.shortText: Rabada to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: RG: "Rabada into his 8th already!! Who'll bowl in the last ten Faf!!"
items.text: another short lifter outside off, he rides the bounce and knocks it down into the gully
items.shortText: Rabada to Mohammad Mithun, no run
